maple: A004648 := proc(n)    modp(ithprime(n),n) ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 02 2014
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,100,print1(prime(n)%n,","))(MAGMA) [(NthPrime(n) mod n): n in [1..100]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Apr 06 2011(Haskell)a004648 n = a004648_list !! (n-1)a004648_list = zipWith mod a000040_list [1..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 30 2012
